name: 23 Car-root Beer
description:
Ms. Carrot has just opened a homegrown root beer outlet which serves 3 types of beer. 

Help '23 Car-root Beer' deliver its orders before customer lose their patience.

It's simple! 

1. Get the root from the pantry. 

2. Put the root in the keg. 

3. Fill the bottles.

4. Refrigerate it. But not for too long or the bottle will break.

5. Serve the customer.

Credits

Programming and music by Maaz

3D art by Hemanth

2D art and game design by Shrishti

Created for GGJ2023!
